Name: HUAWEI VR Glass 6DoF Driver
About the game: The VR 6DoF Motion Tracking kit driver is compatible with HUAWEI VR Glass and the 6DoF Motion Tracking Kit. Thanks to the powerful computing capability of the independent graphics card, it is able to accelerate the rending of virtual 3D space, The PC projection mode enables you to enjoy an 3D IMAX-level immersion, as for a breathtaking augmented Steam gaming experience.
